measured_by: EyeLink 1000 Plus eye-tracker dwell-time (fixations within ROIs)
justification: "Eye movements were monitored using an EyeLink 1000 Plus eye tracker … We recorded the dwell time of the eye-tracking data on all the ROIs per trial … to reflect the amount of attention to each ROI."

measured_by: proportion of choosing risky options in the risky-choice task
justification: "Participants completed a task comprising 100 pairs of risky choices … we report the means of the posterior predictive distribution of the likelihood of choosing risky options … (i.e., the model-predicted risky preference)."
"Computational modeling, integrating aDDM and CPT, quantified the attentional mechanisms … the attentional bias parameter in the aDDM … differed in the 'lose ¥0' and 'win ¥0' conditions."
